meanings.definition: The act or process of magnetizing.
meanings.sent1: The magnetizations of the metal pieces made them attract each other.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the magnetizations of different materials in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The magnetizations of the toys on the fridge made them look like they were dancing.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had the magnetizations of a powerful magnetic field, drawing everyone closer.
meanings.sent5: The magnetizations of the compass needle always pointed north, guiding the lost hikers.

meanings.sent1: The magnetizations of the iron bar were strong after being exposed to the magnet.
meanings.sent2: The magnetizations of the fridge door kept the shopping list in place.
meanings.sent3: The magnetizations of the cat to the warm blanket made it refuse to move.
meanings.sent4: The magnetizations of the music filled the room, making everyone tap their feet.
meanings.sent5: The magnetizations of the stars in the night sky captivated the young astronomer.
